dance.iande_actl_load¶

Copies data from “data/iande.tsv” into tab “iande_actl” after doing some checks.

Functions

process([force])

Load data from 'data/iande.tsv' into tab 'iande_actl' Handles category nesting as groups with subtotals.

required_lines(forecast_start_year)

Compute the list of required lines given the forecast start year in form y_year :param forecast_start_year: The first forecast year as a String (Ynnnn)
dance.iande_actl_load.required_lines(forecast_start_year)¶

Compute the list of required lines given the forecast start year in form y_year :param forecast_start_year: The first forecast year as a String (Ynnnn)

Returns: the required lines and all lines as sets

dance.iande_actl_load.process(force=False)¶

Load data from ‘data/iande.tsv’ into tab ‘iande_actl’ Handles category nesting as groups with subtotals. Makes checks to ensure nothing of the forecast gets lost due to changed lines. Checks can be overridden by a flag.

Parameters:

force – Optional, True to override warning
